ModMetaData.name: Holsters
ModMetaData.author: Iwo Rosiak
ModMetaData.description:
Thank you for downloading my mod! You are amazing!
To report any issues please refer to the mod page which I check every minute :) :) : )
Ever wondered what happens to all equipment pawns use? I mean, sure, it pops up when pawn is drafted but vanishes as soon as danger passes! Well, not anymore. Holsters takes care of this issue by displaying each colonist's weapon on their backs/belts!
<size=22>Overview:</size> - [b]Equipped items are displayed at all times just like apparel[/b] adding to the immersive aspects of the game. - Extensive mod settings allow for adjusting positions of items, so you are not stuck with my default settings! :)
<size=22>Compatibility:</size> This mod can be added to/removed from existing saves without problems.
Have fun with my mod and happy holsteringâ€¦ ;)
